record.dc:title: 75BT2, 15BT2, Butler County, Kentucky. Annis Mound. Feature #51, Sub-Primary mound structure.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Structure outline on Sub-Primary mound, taken from its northwest corner. To the left is seen the double line of postmolds which forms the north wall of the structure; to the right, the inner postmold row of the west wall. Fire basins and pits are seen in the structure enclosure. View from northwest. See also photo 72, 73, 74.
